docs.lead_paragraph: In the more than four months since Hurricane Sandy struck, the reopening of the Fairway market has brought people back and even helped other businesses.

headline.seo: Fairway’s Return Brings New Life to Storm-Battered Red Hook
headline.main: Businesses Return to the Neighborhood, and the People Follow
headline.kicker: Coming Back | Red Hook Lobster Pound
headline.print_headline: Businesses Return to the Neighborhood, and the People Follow

docs.abstract: Reopening of Fairway market in Red Hook neighborhood of Brooklyn has helped bring people back and helps other businesses affected by Hurricane Sandy rebound; Red Hook Lobster Pound reopens, with new deep fryer (Series: Coming Back).
docs.snippet: In the more than four months since Hurricane Sandy struck, the reopening of the Fairway market has brought people back and even helped other businesses.

docs.lead_paragraph: After a soldier died, his parents took aim at a dietary supplement — and the retail chain GNC, where he bought it.

headline.seo: Workout Supplement Challenged After Death of Soldier

docs.abstract: Leanne and Michael Sparling blame workout supplement Jack3d for their son Michael Lee's death, after 22-year-old Army private suffered cardiac arrest while running with his unit at Fort Bliss, Tx, in 2011; filed wrongful-death lawsuit against supplement maker USPlabs and retailer GNC, arguing that companies sold defective product and failed to warn about its risks.
docs.snippet: After a soldier died, his parents took aim at a dietary supplement — and the retail chain GNC, where he bought it.

byline.original: By NATASHA SINGER and PETER LATTMAN

docs.lead_paragraph: New York Road Runners, which was criticized over its handling of the canceled New York City Marathon, has had fewer finishers at its races this year.

headline.seo: Road Runners Facing More Difficulty 4 Months After Marathon Uproar
headline.main: Road Runners Facing More Difficulty 4 Months After Marathon Uproar
headline.print_headline: Road Runners Facing Difficulty Months After Marathon Uproar

docs.abstract: Questions persist about future of the New York Road Runners Club, which faces declining participation and competition from rival organizers; group faced public outcry for its mishandling of New York City Marathon following Hurricane Sandy.
docs.snippet: New York Road Runners, which was criticized over its handling of the canceled New York City Marathon, has had fewer finishers at its races this year.

byline.original: By KEN BELSON and ANDREW W. LEHREN

docs.lead_paragraph: Whatever might be said of Yahoo’s workplace, it’s a long way from Google’s, whose various offices reflect the company’s overarching philosophy to create a happy and productive environment.

headline.seo: At Google, a Place to Work and Play
headline.main: Looking for a Lesson in Google’s Perks
headline.print_headline: A Place to Play for Google Staff

docs.abstract: James B Stewart Common Sense column; Google's various offices reflect company's overarching philosophy to create happy and productive work environment; Yahoo would be well-served to emulate Google in that regard.
docs.snippet: Whatever might be said of Yahoo’s workplace, it’s a long way from Google’s, whose various offices reflect the company’s overarching philosophy to create a happy and productive environment.
